TransactionStateContext.DepositState: When users send Ether and the Put function is called.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawalState: When users request Ether via the Collect function.

ExternalInteractions.EtherTransfers: The contract sends and receives Ether between users and the contract when depositing or withdrawing.
ExternalInteractions.LogInteraction: Interacts with an external contract (Log) to record transactions.
